Title: Giants vs. Dwarves
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Dan Kopelman, Jeremy Hall (story)
Actors: Joshua Sasse, Timothy Omundson, Vinnie Jones, Mallory Jansen
Plot: Galavant is fed up with Richard after he trades the Jewel of Valencia for a "dragon" and travels to find the giants on his own. They are not at all what he expected but are willing to help ...
